answers.answer: I hope everything goes good for both you and baby. Prayers for you both.
Good luck xxxx
Oh wow!!! How early are you??? Good luck and keep us posted!!!
Praying girl. Hope all goes well.

I'm 32+5 but I'm in the hospital with the best nicu around. And little man weighs about 5 pounds already plus I've gotten the steroid shot for his lungs. But if he stays in me any longer i will get really sick :(
Wishing u and ur little one the best of luck!!! Praying that all goes well for u!! Good Luck!!!
May god be with both of U and ur bby. I'll keep U in my prayers.. Be strong... Good luck!!..
Good luck lots of luv. :)
Hugs to you. Just remember its for the 2 of you 's wellbeing. You can see your beautiful baby and also know that healthwise you are not at risk.

Good luck mama!! Hope all goes well for both of you. Its for the best for each of your health. And just think positive.. while the rest of us are anxious to meet our little ones you'll be the lucky first to kiss ten little fingers and ten little toes.. Stay strong we're all here cheering for you and baby Trace.
Sending prayers and positive energy for both of you :)
hope its all goes well for you and your lil man....prayers for you both

They are inducing slowly, thank goodness! I was checked about 3 hours ago and hadnt progressed so they put another dose of stuff on my cervix and I've been having contractions so hopefully next time they check me, ill have made some progress. I can get one more dose of that before they start pitocin. Hubby is passed out on the couch and little man is doing well. My bp is still pretty high so i feel crummy, plus I'm hungry...I'm just ready to see how baby Trace is :)
Still not dialated any :/

Sometimes it does take a while with induction.... With my first i was induced and it was 2 days till i had him. But when it did start....it started strong and didn't take long.Hope we hear some good news from you soon xx
Good luck girl, am goin to let the girls on fb know so they can pray for u and all :)
good luck!hope it all goes well! :)
If i don't dialate at all in the next hour then they are going to start prepping for a csection. Prayers please!
X... those are my fingers crossed for you!
Thank you!

question: Doctors have decided that my body can't handle it anymore and are going to induce me today! I'm shaking so bad, prayers for my little man and i!
title: its time...
